channel.title: Deep Learning on
channel.description: Recent content in Deep Learning on

item.title: BackBone Profile
item.description: I performed experiments on various backbone networks: ResNet-18/34/50/101 MobileNetv2 Xception Net All the experiments were performed on a single RTX 2080Ti GPU, a single TitanXP GPU and a single CPU indivdually. For each model architecture, I collected the stats including: Execution Time Memory Used Number of Parameters

item.title: IITR ChatBot
item.description: We are developing an assistance bot for the IITR website using the RASA framework.

item.title: Paper Summaries
item.description: Summaries: You Only Train Once : Loss-conditional training of deep networks, ICLR 2020 GrokNet: Unified Computer Vision Model Trunk and Embeddings For Commerce, KDD 2020 Semantically multi-modal image synthesis, CVPR 2020 Learning to Simulate Dynamic Environments with GameGAN, CVPR 2020 Adversarial Policies : Attacking deep reinforcement learning, ICLR 2020 Unsupervised Learning of Probably Symmetric Deformable 3D Objects from Images in the Wild, CVPR 2020

item.title: ChatBot with Pytorch
item.description: I implemented a chatbot in Pytorch on the Cornell Movie Dialog Corpus dataset using GRUs and Attention mechanism.

item.title: VQ-VAE on MNIST
item.description: I tried to implement VQ-VAE in Pytorch on the MNIST dataset.
